title: Vegetarian Sides That Add Color to the Thanksgiving Table
description: A vibrant kale salad, a creamy chard casserole and carrots glazed in miso bring hearty flavor to the holiday in this menu from David Tanis.
dc:creator: David Tanis
media:credit: Christopher Simpson for The New York Times. Food Stylist: Simon Andrews.
media:description: A tangy vinaigrette gives this salad a tart-sweet appeal.
